mapper.select: SELECT report_id, platform_id, template_id, report_name, report_month, file_name, file_path, file_size, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_reports WHERE report_id != '-1' AND platform_id = #{platformId} AND report_name like CONCAT('%',#{reportName},'%')

SELECT report_id, platform_id, template_id, report_name, report_month, file_name, file_path, file_size, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_reports WHERE platform_id IN ( SELECT erp_user_platforms.platform_id FROM erp_user_platforms WHERE erp_user_platforms.user_id = #{userId} ) AND report_month = #{reportMonth} AND platform_id = #{platformId} AND platform_id like CONCAT('%',#{reportName},'%')
SELECT report_id, platform_id, template_id, report_name, report_month, file_name, file_path, file_size, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_reports WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
